original_title: Tommy Lima in Brazil 3: Soccer Play
overview: In the final installment of Tommy Lima in Brazil, Tommy and a buddy go to a soccer game. While Tommy does miss most of the game, he doesn't miss a bit of the action. There is more meat packed into these guys' soccer shorts than you can even imagine. How Alexander Pictures turns up all these long, fat dicks that show up in his movies makes me want to work in HR for him! You won't want to fast forward through a second of this hot 'soccer match.' Five not to be missed HOT sex scenes. All scenes included three horny men!
tagline: You’ll never think of the World Cup the same way.
title: Tommy Lima in Brazil 3: Soccer Play
